bio: I am a Sr. Usability Analyst / UI Developer, practitioner with an expertise to develop complex software, rich internet applications and business interface. I am highly motivated and multi-disciplinary team player who believes in the quick learning and organizational needs, and is always ready to take the responsibility to lead qualitative, usability-oriented customer and clients' initiatives to assist the team in making critical design decisions of current and future projects. Ranchi University BSc IT Prince Mohammad Bin Fahd University Sr UI Developer
